name: Ants (itch) (JHawk Studios)
description:
Ant -  (noun) - a small insect, often with a sting, that usually lives in a complex social colony with one or more breeding queens.

This game, is about feeding the colony. Open doors by holding the correct amount of food and dashing through, make it past tough challenges, and back to the hill! ALL HAIL THE QUEEN

Recommended To Look At Help Section In-Game Before Playing (shows in-depth controls)

Extra controls -

R - to Restart

M - go to Main Menu at any Time
